name: pikobones
description:
Pikobones is a pico-8 remake of the Knucklebones's Cult of the lamb dice minigame.

Feats:

  • Spooky theme
  • Unlock game pals by betting on the career mode
  • Different AI game styles 
  • Versus mode to play with two controllers
  • Practice and watch modes

Never get bored in the nightly woods again!

Game is still last development stages. Feedback welcome.
